## PagesAnalyticsService.pageView() method

Reports a page view event. Will preform a promise rejection if the API contains an error or if the parameters are misconfigured.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pageView(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
